alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued November 26 at 8:42AM PST until November 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Morning high tides near 6.6 ft combined with elevated surf of 3 to 5 feet on the west facing beaches will result in minor tidal overflow. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas and Orange County Coastal Areas. * WHEN...This morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of low-lying beach parking lots and boardwalks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at La Jolla will be 6.57 ft at 8:06 AM on Monday. High tide at Newport Beach will be 6.62 ft at 8:10 AM Monday.
info.instruction: Potential for flooding of beach parking lots near the morning high tides today and Monday.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
